SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, b.REG_DTM AS CREAT_DT FROM COMTNFILE a INNER JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL b ON ( a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID ) WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND b.REG_DTM <= TO_DATE(#creatDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY b.FILE_SN DESC

sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# AND FILE_SN = #fileSn#
